message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. This is a great deal considering its value. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Let me know if you're willing to consider my offer.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and it also gives you a good deal. Let's see if we can close this deal!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,250. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product and my budget constraints. Let me know if you're willing to consider my offer.
